import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Button } from 'antd' import { FullscreenOutlined,FullscreenExitOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import './css/header.less' import screenfull from 'screenfull' export default class Header extends Component { state ={ isFull:false } fullScreen = ()=>{ const isFull = !this.state.isFull this.setState screenfull.toggle() } render() { const {isFull} = this.state return (
欢迎您，云显靖
柱状图
时间 晴   温度：2-5
) } }
